title: Animated VR Bow Pack
description: Animated VR Bow Pack including 3 bows and 2 arrows w/ 4k textures, 3 LODs, & fully animated / rigged hands. 78 assets total!
longDescription:
Designed for use in VR games and project, the Animated VR Bow Pack includes a Homemade Bow, Longbow and Recurved Bow. We tested this pack with Touch and Vive controllers and created the pack to fit seamlessly into any project. This pack also includes two arrows and a set of animated bare FP Hands and animations designed for VR.


See demo video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3YyogiZmvvg
technicalDetails:
78 Assets

(3) Ultra High AAA Quality Medieval Bows

• Homemade Bow (7,962 Tris / 5,009 Verts)

• Longbow (2,973 Tris / 1,990 Verts)

• Recurve Bow (7,962 Tris / 5,009 Verts)


(9) Medieval Bow LODs


(15) Medieval Bow PBR Textures @ 4096x4096

• Base Color, Metalness, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, for all 3 bows


(3) Medieval Bow Skeletal Rigs

• Homemade Bow Skeletal Rig (10 bones)

• Longbow Skeletal Rig (11 bones)

• Recurve Bow Skeletal Rig (8 bones)


(18) Animations (Idle, Shoot, Aim Idle, Aim Shoot, Holster, Unholster for all 3 bows)

(1) Standard Arrow (1,088 Tris / 768 Verts)

(5) Standard Arrow PBR Textures @ 4096x512 (Base Color, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, Metalness)

(1) Homemade Arrow (112 Tris / 90 Verts)

(5) Homemade Arrow PBR Textures @ 2048x256 (Base Color, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, Metalness)


(1) Hay Target (5,074 Tris / 3,996 Verts)

• (3) Target PBR Textures @ 1024x1024 (Base Color, Roughness, Normal Map)


Ultra High AAA Quality VR Hands

(2) VR Left & Right Hand (6,060 Tris / 3,063 Verts)

(2) VR Left & Right Hand Rigs (17 Bones)

(5) VR Hands PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 (Base Color, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion, Metalness)

(5) VR Hand Poses (Open, Closed, Grab Small, Grab Medium, Hold)

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Updated uproject engine version support from 4.16 to 4.17
